title: IEEE Project​ Expo
description:
Project​ Expo​ was​ organised​ by​ the​ IEEE​ NITK​ student​ branch​ for​ the​ year​ 2017.​ The​ expo​ will showcase​ projects​ done​ by​ IEEE​ student​ members​ pertaining​ to​ the​ fields​ of:

  • Circuits​ and​ Systems
  • Computer​ Science
  • Signal​ processing
  • Mechanical​ and​ Automation​ Systems
  • Nano​ Tech

Many​ of​ these​ projects​ have​ been​ recognized​ nationally​ and​ internationally​ for​ their​ impact​ on society.

The​ expo​ was​ a ​ huge​ success​ and​ students​ from​ all​ over​ the​ Mangalore​ subsection​ attended.
